triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper uses adaptive technology to develop a new prescribed-time stability theorem for uncertain nonlinear systems.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Backstepping method is employed to design the state feedback control strategy for high-order nonlinear systems.

triples.name: Nonlinear system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control of uncertain nonlinear systems with unknown parameters.

triples.name: Full state feedback
triples.relevance: State feedback control is the core control strategy used to achieve prescribed-time convergence.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: The paper applies control theory principles to develop a novel prescribed-time control approach.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel prescribed-time stability theorem based on Lyapunov methods for uncertain nonlinear systems.
